extension.summary: Auto Cleaner By TeamWookie - More Than A Build
extension.description: This has been set up to auto clean, this can be changed via Addon settings. For FREE help and support then TeamWookie can contacted via "Wookie Community" on Facebook or via Twitter at @wookie_wizardry
extension.disclaimer: Forked from Beaus Autocleaner. Thanks go to himself and anybody else who was involved in coding the original
